original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a crucial bridge between business needs and technical solutions, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical prowess, and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business requirements and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to drive transformative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools such as database querying, reporting, and data visualization
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and reporting, with the ability to leverage appropriate tools and techniques to derive meaningful insights

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL, which will be instrumental in developing and maintaining technical configurations
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which will enhance your ability to adapt to changing requirements and deliver solutions efficiently

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, showcasing your ability to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive innovation
- Track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical configurations within complex systems

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, which will provide a valuable understanding of the industry's unique challenges and opportunities
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which will enable you to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and deliver solutions that meet evolving business needs

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Database querying and reporting tools
- Data visualization software
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on continuous learning and the adoption of emerging technologies to drive innovation
- Ability to work independently, as well as part of a team, to deliver high-quality solutions within defined timelines

Role Overview:
As a key member of our team, this role requires a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen. You will be responsible for bridging the gap between complex business processes and effective system configurations, ensuring our [mention specific system] backend accurately reflects the evolving needs of our organization. Your primary focus will be on leveraging data-driven insights to optimize existing processes and develop innovative solutions that drive efficiency and enhance the overall user experience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their specific business requirements, gather detailed information, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to derive meaningful insights
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the quality of the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in data analysis and reporting, with the ability to leverage appropriate tools and techniques to derive meaningful insights and drive data-driven decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, which will be essential in developing and maintaining technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which will enhance your ability to adapt to changing requirements and deliver solutions efficiently

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into effective technical configurations within complex systems, demonstrating your ability to bridge the gap between business and technology
- Experience in implementing data-driven solutions, showcasing your ability to leverage data insights to optimize processes and drive continuous improvement

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, which will provide a valuable understanding of the industry's unique challenges and opportunities
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies, which will enable you to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and deliver solutions that meet evolving business needs

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Database querying and reporting tools
- Data visualization software
- Agile project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder engagement
- Emphasis on data-driven decision-making and the continuous optimization of business processes
- Ability to work independently, as well as part of a team, to deliver high-quality solutions within defined timelines
